## Understanding NIS2 Compliance {#nis2-assessment}

The Network and Information Security Directive 2 (NIS2) establishes baseline cybersecurity requirements for entities operating in critical sectors. Our assessment services provide a comprehensive evaluation of your compliance status.

```{=html}

  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-body">
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-md-3 text-center">

              <div class="process-icon">
                <i class="bi bi-search fs-1 text-primary"></i>
              </div>

              <p>Determine if your organization falls under NIS2 directive requirements</p>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="col-md-3 text-center">
            <div class="process-step">
              <div class="process-icon">
                <i class="bi bi-list-check fs-1 text-primary"></i>
              </div>
              <h5>Controls Assessment</h5>
              <p>Evaluate implementation of required security measures</p>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="col-md-3 text-center">
            <div class="process-step">
              <div class="process-icon">
                <i class="bi bi-exclamation-triangle fs-1 text-primary"></i>
              </div>
              <h5>Gap Identification</h5>
              <p>Identify non-conformities and areas requiring improvement</p>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="col-md-3 text-center">
            <div class="process-step">
              <div class="process-icon">
                <i class="bi bi-map fs-1 text-primary"></i>

</div>
```

## Comprehensive Gap Assessments {#gap-assessment}

Our gap assessment service provides a detailed analysis of the delta between your current security posture and NIS2 requirements, delivering actionable recommendations for achieving compliance.

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="timeline">
      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Phase 1: Current State Analysis</h3>
          <p><strong>Duration:</strong> 1-2 weeks</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Documentation review (policies, procedures, technical controls)</li>
            <li>Stakeholder interviews (IT, security, legal, management)</li>
            <li>Technical controls assessment</li>
            <li>Process and procedure evaluation</li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Phase 2: Gap Identification</h3>
          <p><strong>Duration:</strong> 1 week</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Map current controls to NIS2 requirements</li>
            <li>Identify compliance gaps and deficiencies</li>
            <li>Document non-conformities with evidence</li>
            <li>Assess gap severity and impact</li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Phase 3: Risk Prioritization</h3>
          <p><strong>Duration:</strong> 1 week</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Risk-based gap prioritization</li>
            <li>Impact analysis (regulatory, operational, reputational)</li>
            <li>Effort and cost estimation</li>
            <li>Quick win identification</li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Phase 4: Remediation Planning</h3>
          <p><strong>Duration:</strong> 1-2 weeks</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Detailed remediation recommendations</li>
            <li>Phased implementation roadmap</li>
            <li>Resource requirements (people, tools, budget)</li>
            <li>Success metrics and KPIs</li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="timeline-item">
        <div class="timeline-marker bg-primary"></div>
        <div class="timeline-content">
          <h3>Phase 5: Report Delivery & Presentation</h3>
          <p><strong>Duration:</strong> 1 week</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Comprehensive gap assessment report</li>

            <li>Stakeholder presentation and Q&A</li>

  </div>
```

## Who Needs NIS2 Compliance?

NIS2 applies to entities across multiple sectors. Your organization may be covered if you operate in:

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-4">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-3">
      <div class="card-header bg-warning">
        <h4 class="mb-0">Essential Entities (High Critical)</h4>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <ul class="mb-0">
          <li>Energy (electricity, oil, gas, hydrogen)</li>
          <li>Transport (air, rail, water, road)</li>
          <li>Banking and financial market infrastructures</li>
          <li>Health sector</li>
          <li>Drinking water and wastewater</li>
          <li>Digital infrastructure</li>
          <li>Public administration</li>
          <li>Space</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-3">
      <div class="card-header bg-info text-white">
        <h4 class="mb-0">Important Entities (Other Critical)</h4>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <ul class="mb-0">
          <li>Postal and courier services</li>
          <li>Waste management</li>
          <li>Chemicals production and distribution</li>
          <li>Food production and distribution</li>
          <li>Manufacturing (medical devices, electronics, machinery, vehicles)</li>
          <li>Digital providers (cloud, data centers, CDNs, DNS, marketplaces, search engines)</li>
          <li>Research organizations</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

:::
